# Capfizz

## Capfizz Docs

- [The Black Hole of Innovation](https://docs.capfizz.com/v2/the-black-hole-of-innovation)
- [Welcome To Capfizz Network](https://docs.capfizz.com/v2/the-black-hole-of-innovation/readme)
- [Sentry Node](https://docs.capfizz.com/v2/sentry-node): #CapfizzNode
- [Community Guidelines](https://docs.capfizz.com/v2/sentry-node/community-guidelines)
- [Rewards](https://docs.capfizz.com/v2/rewards)
- [Network Rewards](https://docs.capfizz.com/v2/rewards/network-rewards): Capfizz promises profits when users “transfer bandwidth” to the protocol and they can accumulate FIZZ to receive native Cap tokens as rewards.
- [Referral Bonus](https://docs.capfizz.com/v2/rewards/referral-bonus)
- [Account Boosts](https://docs.capfizz.com/v2/rewards/account-boosts)
- [Tokenomic](https://docs.capfizz.com/v2/tokenomic): Capfizz Tokenomics
- [Troubleshoot](https://docs.capfizz.com/v2/troubleshoot): This page will be updated regularly.
- [FAQ](https://docs.capfizz.com/v2/faq)
- [Privacy & Term](https://docs.capfizz.com/v2/privacy-and-term)
- [Official Links](https://docs.capfizz.com/v2/official-links)
